# `list_element_exists`

Test if list element exists


## Description

Test if nth element of list exists


## Usage

```r
list_element_exists(x, index)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`x`     |     list
`index`     |     element index


## Value

boolean
